titleStmt.title: By the major whereas the infection of the plague is daily dispersed more & more in diuers parts of this city and the liberties thereof ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor (1624-1625 : Gore)
Gore, John, Sir, d. 1636.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Isaac Iaggard, Printer to the Honourable Citie of London,

notesStmt.note: At head of sheet, royal arms, and shield surrounded by initials, I. G. M.

"Giuen at Guild Hall, the fift day of Aprill, 1625.
